mechanics.condition: Character level is 4 OR 6 OR 8 OR 12 OR 14 OR 16 OR 19
mechanics.outcome: Player may choose ONE of the following options: 1) Increase one ability score by 2, OR 2) Increase two different ability scores by 1 each.

mechanics.trigger: Applying an Ability Score Increase via this feature
mechanics.condition: The chosen ability score's value would exceed 20 after the increase
mechanics.outcome: The ability score cannot be increased beyond 20 by this feature

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
